welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ontario, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant arts scene, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ontario has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Heintzelman's BBQ Pit
restaurants.description: Heintzelman's BBQ Pit is a bbq joint located in Ontario.

restaurants.name: Dunkin Donuts
restaurants.description: Dunkin Donuts is a donut shop located in Ontario.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a restaurant, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a comfortable and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for free, no password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves all commercial flights and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Municipal Airport primarily serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at El Monte Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
